contact.address: Sphoorthy Engineering College Nadargul Village, Saroornagar Mandal, Hyderabad, Telangana- 501510, India

admissions.procedure: 1. Admission to 4-year B.Tech. Degree Programme The admission into undergraduate engineering programme (B.Tech.) for all branches of study is made as per the relevant rules of Government and norms/guidelines of the Telangana State Council of Higher Education: 70% of intake i.e., “Category-A Seats” will be filled by the Convener, TSEAMCET based on the merit rank obtained in state level entrance examination-TSEAMCET. 30% of intake i.e., “Category-B Seats” will be filled by the college management as per the relevant rules of Government and norms/guidelines of the Telangana State Council of Higher Education from time to time. Spot Admission for B.Tech. 4-year Course:Any seats left vacant in the convener quota, will be filled by the college based on the guidelines given by Convener TSEAMCET. The College issues an advertisement after necessary approval from Convener and the list of admitted candidates will be forwarded to Convener for ratification/approval. 2.	Admission to B.Tech. Degree (Lateral Entry) Programme for Diploma Holders Seats up-to 10% of sanctioned intake of each programme of undergraduate course shall be filled by the Convener, TSECET as lateral entry admission into second year of B.Tech. programme based on the merit rank obtained in state level entrance examination-TSECET.
admissions.epayments: SBI Online Fee Payment Portal Edutinker (HDFC E-COLLECT) Payment link Regular exam fee payment Link (CampX)

B.Tech: CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (CSM)
M.Tech: CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (CSM)

admissions.eligibility: B.Tech. Eligibility Requirements 1. For admission under Category-A A candidate for admission to the first year of 4-year B.Tech. degree programme under Category-A: must have passed the intermediate examination of Board of Intermediate Education, Govt. of Telangana with Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry as optional subjects or any other examination recognized by the JNTUH as equivalent thereto. shall have to qualify in the EAMCET examination conducted by Govt. of Telangana. Candidates should belong to the state of Telangana / Andhra Pradesh. The candidates should satisfy Local/ Non-Local status requirements as laid down in the Telangana / Andhra Pradesh. Educational Institutions (Regulation of Admission) order, 1974 as subsequently amended. 2. For admission under Category-B A candidate for admission to the first year of 4-year B.Tech. degree programme under Category-B must have secured 60% of marks in the intermediate examination of Board of Intermediate Education, Govt. of Telangana with Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry as optional subjects or any other examination recognized by the JNTUH as equivalent thereto. 3. For admission to B.Tech. Degree (Lateral Entry) Programme A candidate for admission to the second year of 4-year B.Tech. degree programme: must have completed the Diploma/Polytechnic. shall have to qualify in the TSECET examination conducted by Govt. of Telangana.

computer_science_and_engineering.about:
About Department
The role of Computer Science and Engineering
The role of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) is pivotal in shaping the modern world, impacting a wide array of industries and areas of life, from education to healthcare to entertainment. The key aspects include Advancement of Technology and Innovation with Problem-Solving Tools, Innovation in AI and Machine Learning, Facilitating Digital Transformation with Automation and Efficiency, Integration of IoT (Internet of Things), Cybersecurity and Data Protection by Securing Digital Infrastructure, Data Privacy, Impacting Healthcare and Medicine with Medical Research and Diagnostics, Telemedicine and Health Informatics, Support for Other Disciplines by Interdisciplinary Collaboration. The role of Computer Science and Engineering extends far beyond coding or software development; it is a driving force behind the innovations that shape modern society. As a rapidly evolving field, it will continue to play an essential role in addressing global challenges, improving efficiency across industries, and fostering economic growth. Computer Science and Engineering is more than a technical discipline; it is a powerful tool for building a more connected, sustainable, and prosperous world.
Computer Science and Engineering-
Computer Science and Engineering

computer_science_and_engineering.hod-message:
Prof. Kiran M.
Computer Science and Engineeringdr.kiran@sphoorthyengg.ac.in
HOD Message
Department of Computer Science and Engineering, started in the year 2004, under its visionary management, and emerged as an epicenter for excellence in offering engineering, education in Computer Science and Engineering with state-of-the-art infrastructure, certified faculty, constant industry engagement, and quality policies.  It is a pride to represent this department as its H.O.D. and be an integral part of its endeavors. The Department of Computer Science and Engineering is in line with the technological advancements both in terms of infrastructure and human resources to cater to the needs of the students in all aspects. The Department strongly emphasizes practical education to complement theoretical knowledge by providing various learning platforms like CODETANTRA, HACKER RANK, REFERENCE GLOBE, etc. Students are encouraged to take up innovative projects which can be deployed in community service. Strong industrial and societal connect help them to gain real-time experience thereby enhancing their career opportunities and ensuring professional career accomplishments.
Dr. Kiran B. M. has completed his Ph.D. in CSE and is having a total of 20 years’ experience. His research interests are Cyber Security, Data Mining, Information Retrieval, NLP, Image Processing, AI & ML, Music Therapy, Engineering Education etc. He has around 25+ publications in journals/Conferences. He is NBA & OBE expert and certified and actively involved in Cocurricular and Extracurricular Activities. He is the member of various professional bodies.He has given invited lectures on many academic courses and also on Outcome based Education & NBA, Data Analytics in Business, Reforms in Engineering Education, Project Management and Reporting using Latex, Data Science using Python language etc. in various Engineering colleges. He has been the session chairs, jury member for various events at institute level and also university level. He is also a reviewer of reputed journals. Sir has attended More than 45 FDPs and is an active learner through online platforms like NPTEL, Coursera and Udemy etc.
Computer Science and Engineering-

cse_ai_ml.about:
About Department
AI technology is important because it enables human capabilities viz. understanding, reasoning, planning, and perception, to be undertaken by software effectively, efficiently, and at low cost. AI has numerous, tangible use cases today that are enabling corporate revenue growth and cost savings in all industrial sectors.
Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning UG program is primarily focused on applications of Machine Learning to impart intelligence in machines to solve non-deterministic problems which humans can solve with ease. If the natural intelligence of humans can be imparted to computers, then they can also make decisions like humans.
The main objective of AI & ML is to program computers, use datasets or knowledge to solve a given problem. Many successful applications based on machine learning include systems that analyse past sales data to predict customer behaviour to complete a task using minimum resources and extract knowledge from bioinformatics information.
A new report by Grand View Research projects that the global artificial intelligence market will reach USD 390.9 billion by 2025. According to the forecast, the market will grow at a CAGR of 46.2% by the year 2025. Integrating artificial intelligence across various applications is a significant market driver.
The development of voice and image recognition contributes to the worldwide market's growth, as they represent the most common applications of AI in our daily lives, being used in a variety of devices and for many purposes. Also, robotics, drones, and self-driving cars all need better image recognition technology.
CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning-
CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

cse_ai_ml.hod-message:
Dr. KVSN RAMARAO
CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning9603899920ramarao.kvsn@sphoorthyengg.ac.in
HOD Message
Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning are transforming the way we live, work, and innovate, shaping the future across industries such as healthcare, finance, transportation, manufacturing, and sustainable development. Our department is committed to nurturing technically competent, ethically responsible, and industry-ready professionals who can contribute meaningfully to this rapidly evolving domain.
The AIML department offers a well-structured curriculum that blends strong theoretical foundations with hands-on practical exposure. We emphasize experiential learning through laboratories, real-world projects, internships, industry collaborations, workshops, hackathons, and research-oriented activities. Students are encouraged to explore emerging areas such as deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, data analytics, robotics, and intelligent systems.
Our faculty members are well qualified, motivated, and dedicated to academic excellence, research, and continuous learning. We focus not only on technical proficiency but also on developing critical thinking, problem-solving skills, innovation, teamwork, and professional ethics among our students.
I warmly invite students, parents, industry partners, and academic collaborators to engage with us as we work together to shape the future of intelligent technologies.
Dr.Rao had more than 25 years of blended experience in academics, Industry and International Research. Obtained his PhD in AIML technology from world ranked Australian University. Good experience in academics and worked as Principal, Dean and Professor in reputed academic Institutions. Significant Industrial experience at MNC in Tech Mahindra and worked as vice president in AI based tech start-up company. Field of interests include Machine learning,  Cyber- Security and Biodiversity assessment.
CSE - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning-

cse_cyber_security.about:
About Department
Cyber Security Department is headed by Mrs. P. Sandhya Rani. The disciplines offered by this department are Ethical hacking,digital forensics,cryptography. It features an effective curriculum and dedicated activities, which can provide the B.Tech students with excellent technical education. Due to the superior coaching programs, the students earn proficiency in the technical aspects, and they can turn out to be the leaders in the future, by using excellent managerial skills, displaying technical prowess and proving themselves to be the high productive workers.
Cyber security refers to protecting systems connected to the internet from threats in cyberspace, some of them business-critical. It involves protecting an organization's software, data, and hardware and helps prevent cybercriminals from gaining access to devices or their networks.

HOD Message
Welcome to the Department of Cyber Security.
Our goal is to ensure that our engineering graduates are well prepared to play the roles of problem solvers, project leaders, entrepreneurs, and above all ethical citizens of a global society. To maintain a high standard of education, the department offers extracurricular and co-curricular activities along with add-on courses in addition to the academic syllabi to ensure that the students are well-prepared to deal with changing industry trend. Our department places a strong emphasis on innovation and research, and we also share information about using cyber-based software to solve practical real-world issues. We encourage the students to flourish not only in their academic work but also in the whole development of their personalities. Through industry institute collaboration, our institution gives students a platform to improve their employment skills.Department comprises a crew of well experienced, highly qualified and dedicated team who are always enthusiastic to update their knowledge. Faculties are always encouraged to enhance their knowledge up to date. I wish all the students and faculty a good academic career.

cse_data_science.about:
About Department
The institution was a pioneer in offering engineering programs in emerging technologies and started offering B. Tech in Data Science in the year 2020 with an intake of 180. Department of Data Science has experienced faculty members with domain expertise, global certifications in cutting edge technologies, and modern infrastructure facilitating students and staff to work on all types of Data Science use cases. Department of Data Science holds exclusive domain specific MOUs apart from institutional MOUs. Quality education is offered by employing active learning strategies, involving students in project based learning, internships through domain specific organizations, and funding for innovative projects. Students are encouraged to take up projects in community service and deploy technology solutions for community problems to be in line with the vision and mission of the department.
Data Science is one of the emerging technologies in the computer science and engineering stream. Data Science comprises core engineering courses, mathematics, and statistics. Due to rapid digitalization, extremely large-scale data is being generated today. This voluminous data is processed and analyzed to gain deep insights into the data which can help in making strategic decisions. Predictive analytics, recommendation systems, logistics, health care, computer vision, speech recognition, Business Intelligence, etc. are applications of Data Science. Data science is being employed by every organization to offer value-added services to customers and maintain a competitive edge. An engineering graduate in Data Science can be employed in emerging job roles like Data Analyst, Data Engineer, and Data Scientist.

cse_data_science.hod-message:
Dr. Allam Balaram
CSE - Data Sciencehodds@sphoorthyengg.ac.in
HOD Message
Department of Data Science, started in the year 2021, under its visionary management, with two decades of rich experience in offering quality engineering education. Data Science is one of the nine emerging areas identified by AICTE and Govt. of India. Availability of technology, usage of smartphones, social media, and online applications have led to the creation of extremely large scales of data from a variety of sources and heterogeneous in nature. A blend of statistics and computer science engineering skills is required to store, process, and analyze the data leading to the creation of a new engineering program called Data Science. There is an acute shortage of skilled professionals in the field of Data Science and hence the opportunities are unlimited. As a Leader with a team of certified faculty members, I take pride in leading the department with an assurance of professional career accomplishment to all the Data Science aspirants.
Dr. Allam Balaram, Professor and HOD, Department of CSE-Data Science, Spoorthy Engineering College, Hyderabad, Telangana State, India. He has completed Ph.D, Computer Science and Engineering from St. Peters Institute Higher Education and Research in the year 2018. He completed M.Tech., Computer Science and Technology from Andhra University in the year 2008. He has more than 19 years of Teaching and research experience. He has published 67 Research articles in reputed international journals & conferences and delivered guest lectures on topics like Formal Languages and Automata Theory, Object Oriented Programming through Java and Compiler Design. He is a Life member of professional bodies like Indian Society for Technical Education and Computer Society of India. His research interests include VANETs, Wireless Sensor Networks, Ad-hoc Networks and Formal Languages

Vision
Mission
To emerge as the Data Science Centre of Excellence in the region,  offer technology services to industry, academia, and community.
1. To provide modern infrastructure facilities to access, process, and analyze large-scale data sets.
2. Continuous empowerment of faculty and students in the latest technological advancements in Data Science.
3. To strengthen industry connections, collaborate with academia, and develop projects to serve the community by large.

freshman_engineering.about:
About Department
Department of Freshman Engineering is headed by Dr. P. GAYATHRI PAVANI, Professor of Physics. The department offers foundation courses such as basic sciences, Engineering sciences, humanities and social sciences to all the undergraduates of Engineering disciplines.   It is a Supporting Department to all Engineering Branches in offering special courses as per curriculum. It features an effective curriculum and dedicated activities, which can provide excellent technical education to the B. Tech students. The students earn proficiency in the technical aspects, due to the superior coaching programs offered. They can turn out to be the leaders in the future, by using excellent managerial skills, displaying technical prowess and proving themselves to be the high productive workers.
The students are offered with the basic concepts and technicalities in the engineering subjects, so that they can understand the advanced aspects of engineering in the further graduation years. They are motivated to the core to make them interested in the subjects so that they can learn effectively and prosper. Our upcoming graduates are also provided with regular counselling and career guidance programs, to help them solve the issues related to education and career-building, and promote all round improvement in them.

freshman_engineering.hod-message:
Dr. P. Gayathri Pavani
Freshman Engineering9392118525hodhns@sphoorthyengg.ac.in, potturigayathripavani@gmail.com
HOD Message
The Department of Freshman Engineering was established in the year 2004. Initially, it consisted of five branches with an intake of 300 students. Now, it has grown to 6 branches with an intake of 600 students. Students learn the basic knowledge of science and engineering for the first academic year.
The Department has a rich curriculum and allied activities to provide a comprehensive education for B. Tech graduates. It prepares them technically prowess, critical thinkers, productive citizens, and leaders in a wide range of careers: government as well as an array of managerial options in the private sector. During their study, students complete rigorous programs of course work and participate in a variety of co-curricular programs.
Presently, the Department of Freshman Engineering offers Four undergraduate programmes, namely Computer Science Engineering, CSE-Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, CSE-Data Science, CSE-Cyber Security. The Department has highly qualified academic and teaching staff. The mission of the Department is to produce the top quality education and to conduct leading-edge programs. Finally, we the department of basic sciences and humanities strive for excellence in teaching, training and career building.
My sincere thanks to all the faculty and the students who contribute to the success of the department.
It’s my privilege to be head of the department with highly motivated and dedicated personnel.
hodhns@sphoorthyengg.ac.in, potturigayathripavani@gmail.com

freshman_engineering.vision-mission:
Vision
Mission
To provide perfect platform to start with professional courses, and incorporate the required skills in the engineering aspirants to design a gateway to the core of engineering.
M1:To play a vital role in laying a firm foundation of engineering education to edify the expertise of the students in basic sciences & engineering disciplines and strengthening the foundation of budding engineers.
M2:To develop technical and communication skills by providing guest lectures and technical seminars to make the students industry ready.
M3:The state-of-art infrastructure in each classroom gives the lively learning experience to the students which encourage them towards research oriented learning process.
M4:To inculcate ethical values and promote social responsibility through an innovative learning process in basic sciences and humanities.
M5:To provide students with soft skills and behavioural training programs for their holistic development and social consciousness.
